testsuite.name: behave.flaky test example written in behave

testcase.classname: behave.flaky test example written in behave
testcase.name: run a simple test that fails until retried a third time

failure.message: File did not contain the string Hello World, added it and failed

testcase.failure: Failing step: Then file existed - verify it contains the string Hello World ... failed in 0.501s Location: python/behave/behave.feature:6 Assertion Failed: File did not contain the string Hello World, added it and failed
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: run a simple test that fails until retried a third time Given start the behave test ... passed in 0.200s When read file - if its not there - create it and fail ... passed in 0.301s Then file existed - verify it contains the string Hello World ... failed in 0.501s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
